channel.title: Help Please
channel.description: I don't know if this is the write section but, i just found out that emerald cheat client works on my base. Does anyone know how to patch this?

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Hahahaha Lin.

@OP: One word: Packets.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:2, topic:517742”][quote author=Host Gushers link=topic=636009.msg4287732#msg4287732 date=1366661991]
I don’t know if this is the write section but
[/quote]Really? You managed to find this board, but you couldn’t find the board RIGHT ABOVE it labeled Client Help? Jesus christ… And it’s a “cheat” client, which takes advantage of how poorly written your server is. You’re shit out of luck.[/quote]god damn Lin I love you

Read full topic
